payload.objectives: Assess onboarding reliability and fraud controls
payload.context: Launching a new digital onboarding channel for retail customers using only public information.
payload.constraints: Public data only; avoid PII/PHI; reference public regulations and frameworks.
payload.refinements: Emphasize KYC/AML expectations and operational resilience.
payload.instruction_tuning: Use short sentences; cite public standards only; avoid speculative claims.

payload.objectives: Evaluate compliance posture for cloud migration
payload.context: Migrating regulated workloads to public cloud across multiple EU countries.
payload.constraints: No proprietary data; reference public standards (e.g., ISO 27001, NIST, EBA/ECB guidance).
payload.refinements: Highlight data residency, access control, and change management.

payload.objectives: Assess fraud monitoring integration with a third-party partner
payload.context: Integrating third‑party fraud scoring for card‑not‑present traffic.
payload.constraints: Public data only; no customer data; reference public fraud patterns/controls.
payload.refinements: Cover SLA risks, model drift monitoring, and false‑positive management.
payload.instruction_tuning: Call out third‑party governance and monitoring.

payload.objectives: Create risk register for an e‑prescription system rollout
payload.context: Rolling out an e‑prescription platform to 500 stores, integrating with providers and insurers.
payload.constraints: Public data only; avoid PHI; use public HIPAA and FTC guidance.
payload.refinements: Emphasize privacy, access control, and third‑party integrations.
payload.instruction_tuning: Be explicit about assumptions and gaps.

payload.objectives: Assess cyber and operational risks for scaling to multi‑region tenants
payload.context: Expanding a multi‑tenant SaaS product into new APAC markets.
payload.constraints: Public data only; no customer data; reference public cloud and security benchmarks.
payload.refinements: Focus on tenant isolation and incident response readiness.

payload.objectives: Assess third‑party and cyber risks in IoT modernization
payload.context: Connecting plant equipment to an IoT platform with multiple vendors.
payload.constraints: Public data only; avoid proprietary plant details.
payload.refinements: Highlight supply‑chain/vendor risk and OT security.

payload.objectives: Create risks and mitigations for AI‑assisted claims triage
payload.context: Deploying AI to automate claims triage and routing.
payload.constraints: Public data only; no customer PII; reference public model‑risk and fairness expectations.
payload.refinements: Address model risk, bias, and explainability.
payload.instruction_tuning: Explicitly separate inherent vs residual risk drivers.

payload.objectives: Assess cyber/privacy risks for telehealth launch
payload.context: Launching a telehealth portal with third‑party video platform.
payload.constraints: Public data only; avoid PHI; reference public HIPAA and NIST guidance.
payload.refinements: Focus on identity, access, and third‑party dependencies.
payload.instruction_tuning: Assume no access to internal patient data.

payload.objectives: Create operational resilience risk register
payload.context: Modernizing grid operations with new SCADA and analytics tools.
payload.constraints: Public data only; no internal outage records.
payload.refinements: Highlight critical infrastructure and incident response.

payload.objectives: Assess privacy and operational risks for citizen portal
payload.context: Launching a digital portal for citizen services and benefits.
payload.constraints: Public data only; avoid personal data; reference GDPR and eIDAS guidance.
payload.refinements: Emphasize identity assurance and data minimization.

payload.objectives: Identify third‑party and operational risks
payload.context: Adopting an autonomous routing platform from a third‑party vendor.
payload.constraints: Public data only; no internal shipment data.

payload.objectives: Assess privacy/cyber risks for a K‑12 learning platform
payload.context: Launching a learning platform used by minors with parental consent flows.
payload.constraints: Public data only; no student data; reference COPPA/FERPA guidance.
payload.refinements: Emphasize consent, data retention, and identity.

payload.objectives: Create fraud and operational risk register
payload.context: Expanding marketplace to cross‑border sellers with new payment rails.
payload.constraints: Public data only; no cardholder data; reference PCI DSS and fraud controls.
payload.refinements: Focus on payments fraud, chargebacks, and sanctions screening.
payload.instruction_tuning: Include monitoring KPIs for fraud trends.

payload.objectives: Assess regulatory and cyber risks for staking launch
payload.context: Launching a staking product for retail users.
payload.constraints: Public data only; avoid customer data; reference MiCA and public AML guidance.
payload.refinements: Emphasize custody, smart‑contract, and AML risks.
payload.instruction_tuning: Be clear about assumptions on custody model.

payload.objectives: Create operational/cyber risk register for core network upgrade
payload.context: Upgrading 5G core network with new vendor stack.
payload.constraints: Public data only; no internal network diagrams.
payload.refinements: Highlight availability, vendor lock‑in, and security hardening.
payload.instruction_tuning: Focus on resilience and change control.

payload.objectives: Assess fraud/privacy risks for loyalty refresh
payload.context: Refreshing a loyalty program with new digital wallet features.
payload.constraints: Public data only; avoid passenger PII.
payload.refinements: Emphasize account takeover and rewards fraud.

payload.objectives: Identify third‑party and regulatory risks
payload.context: Launching a mortgage origination platform integrating credit bureau and appraisal vendors.
payload.constraints: Public data only; no applicant data; reference public CFPB and FCRA expectations.
payload.refinements: Highlight vendor risk and fair‑lending considerations.

payload.objectives: Create a generic risk register for a new digital product
payload.constraints: Public data only; ask clarifying questions if needed.
payload.instruction_tuning: State assumptions when context is missing.

payload.objectives: Include employee SSNs in the analysis
payload.context: Use real employee ssn values to illustrate risks.
payload.constraints: None
